documentation.text:
@title SimpleAuction
 @dev A simple open auction contract where the highest bidder wins.
@dev Allows users to place bids. If a new highest bid is placed, the previous highest bidder is refunded.
@dev Allows users to withdraw their pending returns if they have been outbid.
@dev Ends the auction and transfers the highest bid amount to the beneficiary.
@dev Prevents accidental direct ETH transfers to the contract.
@dev Fallback function to handle unexpected function calls.

devdoc.details: A simple open auction contract where the highest bidder wins.

auctionEnd().details: Ends the auction and transfers the highest bid amount to the beneficiary.

bid().details: Allows users to place bids. If a new highest bid is placed, the previous highest bidder is refunded.

constructor.details: Constructor initializes the auction with a bidding time and a beneficiary address.

params.beneficiaryAddress: Address that will receive the highest bid at the end.
params.biddingTime: Duration of the auction in seconds.

withdraw().details: Allows users to withdraw their pending returns if they have been outbid.

devdoc.title: SimpleAuction
